comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Henry Pomeroy "Harry" Davison (1867-1922, check spelling) was a banker who was chairman of the war council of the American Red Cross in 1914; his wife was the former Kate Trubee (b. 1871). en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Henry_Pomeroy_Davison

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks pennylrichardsca for clarifying the correct spelling of Davison.  Wish we knew more about the occasion for the photograph, and the other women in it.  I am unable to determine which woman is which of the two named.
